default_steps.steps_card: Copy the card number and open your banking app|Make a transfer in <s>{{bankName}}</s> by card number for the amount of <s>{{amount}}</s>|Press the <s>“{{buttonName}}”</s> button
default_steps.steps_phone: Copy the phone number and open your banking app|Make a transfer in <s>{{bankName}}</s> by phone number for the amount of <s>{{amount}}</s>|Press the <s>“{{buttonName}}”</s> button

steps_transgran_simple.steps: Open the banking app|Press the button (<s>transfer to phone number</s>)|Tap the country code and select <s>{{country}} ({{code}})</s>|Enter the specified phone number|From the bank list, select the bank as shown in the form|Enter the amount and press the (<s>transfer</s>) button

steps_transgran.tbank: Select SBP transfer|Paste the copied phone number|Enter the bank specified in the payment form|Enter the exact amount specified on the website|Press the button to complete the payment
steps_transgran.sberbank: Select transfer by phone number/to another country|Select the country - {{country}}|Go to the "To card or account" button|Paste the copied phone number|Enter the bank specified in the payment form|Enter the exact amount specified on the website|Press the button to complete the payment
steps_transgran.vtbbank: Open the 'Payments' section|Select 'To another country'|Choose '{{country}}' from the list|Select 'Transfer by phone number'|Choose the bank from the list as indicated above|Enter the phone number as indicated above|Press the 'Transfer' button

steps_with_check.steps: Copy {{requisite}} and open your banking app|Make a transfer to {{requisite}} in <s>{{bankName}}</s> for the amount of <s>{{amount}}</s>|Be sure to attach the payment receipt|Click the <s>“{{buttonName}}”</s> button

steps_transgran_tcard2card.tbank: Open the bank app (<s>T-Bank</s>)|Tap the (<s>Pay</s>) button|Select the (<s>Transfer by card number</s>) section|Paste the specified card number|Enter the transfer amount as in the request|Tap the (<s>Transfer</s>) button

steps_azn.sberbank: Copy the specified phone number|Open the <s>Sber</s> app|Select the transfer by phone number function — <s>"transfer to another country"</s>|Then, in the app, specify the destination country — Azerbaijan|Paste the previously copied phone number|Select the specified bank from the available <s>"E-wallet"</s> list|Enter the exact amount specified on the website|Check the details and click the <s>"Complete payment"</s> button

steps_iban.iban: Copy the Iban Number|Open your bank app|Select the <s>"Send Money"</s> function|Next > Select the <s>"Transfer to Another Recipient"</s> function|In the <s>"Recipient Details"</s> window > Paste the previously copied Iban|Enter the recipient's <s>"Last Name and First Name"</s>|Enter the exact amount specified on the website|Check the details and click the <s>"Confirm"</s> button

title.transgran: Instruction for payment from the Russian Federation

steps_transgran_new.steps: Transfer to another country|Select country|Enter phone number|Select bank|Make payment

steps_transgran_abh.steps: Copy the phone number|In the Sber app, tap <s>'Transfer'</s>|Select another country, then <s>{{country}}</s>|Paste the phone number|Select <s>A-Mobile Wallet</s>|Enter the amount <s>{{amount}}</s> and tap <s>Approve</s>

steps_ars.steps: Copy the CVU / CBU|Copy the recipient's name (if necessary)|Open your banking app|Make a transfer for the amount of <s>{{amount}}</s>|Click the <s>“{{buttonName}}”</s> button

check_load_errors.generalError: An error occurred while sending data. Please try again
check_load_errors.fileType: Only images and PDF files are allowed

attention: Make a transfer to the bank and amount specified in the form. Otherwise, we do not guarantee the crediting.
scanQrCode: Scan the QR code with your phone's standard camera.

errors.generalError: An error occurred while sending data. Please try again
errors.cannotBeEmpty: The transaction identifier cannot be empty
errors.regex: The transaction identifier can only contain Latin letters and numbers
